channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-4146] bug with hive.auto.convert.join.noconditionaltask with outer joins
item.description:
Consider the following scenario:

create table s1 as select * from src where key = 0;

set hive.auto.convert.join.noconditionaltask=false;

SELECT * FROM s1 src1 LEFT OUTER JOIN s1 src2 ON (src1.key = src2.key AND src2.key > 10);

gives correct results

0 val_0 NULL NULL
0 val_0 NULL NULL
0 val_0 NULL NULL

whereas it gives no results with hive.auto.convert.join.noconditionaltask set
to true
item.summary: bug with hive.auto.convert.join.noconditionaltask with outer joins

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Integrated in Hive-trunk-h0.21 #2024 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/Hive-trunk-h0.21/2024/)
HIVE-4146 bug with hive.auto.convert.join.noconditionaltask with outer joins
(Namit via Gang Tim Liu) (Revision 1458903)

Result = ABORTED
